name: where-in-the-world-is-snoop-dogg
title: Where In The World Is Snoop Dogg?
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Our favorite country musician is going to India. Snoop Dogg has a new song called “Singh is Kinng,” written as the title song for an upcoming Bollywood movie. We’re crossing our fingers and hoping that he’ll permeate India with his country tunes, too. Other than that, this has nothing to do with Nashville and everything to do with our Snoop Dogg obsession. Carry on. 

Photo from The New York Times.
